let_sign_up_to_get_started_with_cylimit: Let’s sign up to get started with CyLimit
dont_worry_enter_your_email: Don’t worry! Enter your email and we will send you the instruction on how to change your password.
message_and_enter_the_verification_code: message and enter the verification code
now_let_set_your_new_password: Now let’s set your new password
subscribe_now_to_our_newsletter: Subscribe now to our newsletter to get latest updates and events
join_and_play_together_with_your_friends: Join and play together with your friends
check_your_sms_message: Check your SMS message. We’ve sent you the PIN at
experience_with_cylimit: Experience with CyLimit like never before, bringing fantasy to reality. Put your cycle passion to the test. Connect and trade with other fans in our open marketplace. Build strategies, create lineups and earn points based on your players’ real-life performances.
name: Name
are_you_sure_you_want_to_log_out_of_this: Are you sure you want to log out of this account?
add_your_photo: Add your photo. Recommended size is 256x256px
everytime_you_buy: Everytime you buy, bid or sell completely a card, you will earn a puzzle. Now let's collect it.
your_new_password_must_be: Your new password must be different from previous used passwords
the_email_has_been_sent_to_your_inbox: The email has been sent to your inbox
we_have_successfully_verified_your_email: We have successfully verified your email. You can now proceed to you signin page
collect_cards: Collect cards of famous athletes to create your team
riders_maximum: 2 riders maximum of a same actual team
accept_the_terms_and_conditions: Ive read & accept the Terms & Conditions
no_found_primary: There are no items for sales on auction yet
no_found_secondary: There are no items for sale on the manager sales yet
you_do_not_have_any_referals_yet: You do not have any referrals yet.
feel_free_to_invite_your_friends_via: Feel free to invite your friends via "Invite Friends" on our platform to earn rewards!
are_you_sure_to_delete_your_account: Before you permanently delete your account, please enter your password.
your_account_delete_after_30_days: After the 30-day period is up, your account and all your information will be permanently deleted.
reactive_account_after_request_delete: You can reactivate your CyLimit account at any time by logging back into CyLimit or by using your CyLimit account to log in somewhere else
payment_note: Payment is in $. We invite you to verify that your bank does not charge you fees on $ transactions before making the payment
wrong_team_composition: Wrong team composition you can check rules for more informations
wrong_team_composition_league4: Wrong team composition you can check rules at the top left of this page for more informations, example League 4 : at least 2 White cards needed
be_careful: Be careful, once you choose a team for a division, you won’t be able to modify it afterwards. If you choose a card for a division, you won’t be able to use it for another division (except NA Cards riders)
we_are_working: We are working to make credit card payment available again for auctions.
to_deposit_funds_into: To deposit funds into your CyLimit Wallet please use Ramp (allowing you to buy USDC with your bank account or credit card) or your crypto wallet (metamask, ...)
we_update_the_startlist_every_hour: We update the startlist every hour, so please be patient if you see that it does not currently match the one of PCS
there_are_not_any_teams_in_this_league: There aren't any teams in this League
we_update_the_ranking_every_15_minutes: We update the ranking every 15 minutes, please be patient if you see that the rankings are not up to date.
we_receive_the_PCS_results: Riders results will be available as soon as we receive the PCS data
general_classification_ranking_of_rider_: General classification ranking of rider team
you_already_claimed: You already claimed your reward for this game.
you_dont_have_reward: You don’t have reward for this game.
we_are_only_opening_league_4: We are only opening league 4 for this game because we do not have enough CyLimit riders in the starlist to ensure the opening of the other leagues.
no_scarcity_bonus_on_this_league: No scarcity bonus on this league
this_card_is_participating_in_a_game: This card is participating in a game
when_selling_this_card: When selling this card, it will be removed from your current team. Remember to update your team so that it will be valid for the race
please_select_which_one_do_you_prefer: Please select which one do you prefer?
to_share_if_score: To share if your team score > {{value}}
choose_your_reward: Choose your reward. You can't take both.
cylimit_rewards_you_free_cards_to_start_: Cylimit rewards you free cards to start being a manager
this_chocie_is_irreversible: This chocie is IRREVERSIBLE. You won't be able to change any cards after clicking on validate
your_next_Swap_will_be_available_in: Your next Transfer will be available in 48 hours
select_a_card_to_trade_in: Select a card to trade in
trade_in_a_free_card_for_a_new_one: Trade in a free card for a new one
payment_note_euro: Payment is in €. We invite you to verify that your bank does not charge you fees on € transactions before making the payment
the_rate_is_changed_please_click_here_to: The rate USD/EUR has changed. Please refresh
to_continue_please_confirm_your_email: To continue, please confirm your email
you_already_have_claimed_your_rewards_fo: You already claimed your reward for this game
to_share_with_condition: To share if your team score {{condition}} {{value}}
i_certify_that_i_am_18_years_of_age_or_o: I certify that I am 18 years of age or older
i_have_read_and_accept_the_terms_and_con: I have read and accept the terms and conditions
click_on_each_card_and_choose_your_rider: Click on each card and choose your rider from a selection of 3 cards
the_score_of_the_rider_is_represented: The score of the rider is represented by In Race Score.
in_access_mode: In Access mode, if a rider won stages during the race, his score is the best between, In Race Score and Minimum winning stage score.

at_the_end_of_the_race: At the end of the race:
create_your_account_by_filling_in_the_fo: Create your account by filling in the following fields
you_need_riders_to_take_part: You need riders To take part of it. CyLimit offers you a pack containing 50 riders.
the_riders_you_choose_will_serve: The riders you choose will serve you throughout the season. You are entitled to an exchange every 2 days.
you_can_complete_your_selection: You can complete your selection at any time by clicking on the Claim Free Cards button
you_are_entitled_to_one_exchange_every_2: The riders you choose will serve you throughout the season. You are entitled to one exchange every 2 days.
friends_inviting_referred_friends: Referred friends buy cards on the Primary market
fantasy_games_scoring_records_card_score: Score 100 points with a card level 20
Score 125 points with a captain card
collectibles_marketplace_primary_market_: Buy a blue card on the Primary market
Buy a yellow card on the Primary market
Buy a pink card on the Primary market
collectibles_marketplace_secondary_marke: Buy a blue card on the Secondary market
Buy a yellow card on the Secondary market
Buy a pink card on the Secondary market
Sell a card on the Secondary market
collectibles_marketplace_primary_buy_nft: Buy a card of the same rider on the Primary market
Buy a card of the same team and season on the Primary market
collectibles_marketplace_primary_buy_blu: Buy a blue card with the first serial number on the Primary market
collectibles_marketplace_primary_buy_pin: Buy a pink card with the first serial number on the Primary market
remaining_cards_will_be_picked_randomly: Remaining cards will be picked randomly.
be_careful_this_choice: Be careful, this choice is irreversible. you won't be able to change any cards after clicking on validate.
to_be_able_to_withdraw: To be able to withdraw you need to verify your KYC
your_id_has_been_refused: Your ID has been refused. Please try again.
before_adding_your_id: Before adding your ID, review your personal info
please_review_the_info_below: Please review the info below for accuracy so we can verify your identity. Your ID should match the personal info in your Cylimit account.
file_types_only: JPG, JPEG, PNG or PDF only
upload_an_image_of_your_id: Upload an image of your ID
make_sure_your_photos: Make sure your photos aren't blurry and the front of your ID clearly shows your face.
you_have_successfully_authenticated_your: You have successfully authenticated your ID, now you can use the withdrawal function
welcome_in_your_Team_Creation_for_the_ra: Welcome in your Team Creation for the race: {{value}}
choose_riders_to_participate_and_win_rew: Choose {{value}} riders to participate and win rewards !
if_you_already_chose_some_riders: If you already chose some riders, they won't be replace. Random riders will be picked only for remaining spots. Riders you choose will serve you throughout the season. You are entitled to a trade every 2 days.
you_have_no_riders_in_the_startlist: You have no riders in the startlist right now for this race, you can put stagiaires to complete your team, or uncheck “Riders on startlist” if you think you know better the startlis
be_careful_by_refreshing_or_closing_this: Be careful, by refreshing or closing this trade, your free transfer will be lost for 48h.
acquired_score_without_end_of_race_class: Acquired score = score without end of race classifications
at_the_end_of_the_race_bonus_is_given: At the end of the race, bonus is given if the rider is the best of his teammates (only as “Leader”).
at_the_end_of_the_race_malus_is_given: At the end of the race, malus is given if the rider is the best of his teammates (only as “Domestic”).
at_the_end_of_the_race_points_are_given_: At the end of the race, points are given according to the best general classification ranking from one of his teammates.
if_the_rider_is_the_best_of_his_teammate: If the rider is the best of his teammates, he scores 0 point.
if_a_rider_did_not_start_all_the_stages: If a rider did not start all the stages, points are multiplied by the percentage of stages he started.
for_each_stage_points_are_given_accordin: For each stage, points are given according to the best stage ranking of his teammates.
a_rider_has_to_start_the_stage_to_score_: A rider has to start the stage to score points here
breakaway_criteria_is_only_used_if_break: Breakaway criteria is only used if breakaway data is provided by our data provider. If at the end of the race, our data provider is still not able to provide breakaway data, we use “Intermediate Sprints Presence” to replace it*.
if_breakaway_data_is_available: If Breakaway data is available, here is the point a rider will score for each km spent in a breakaway:
our_data_provider_was_not_able_to_identi: Our data provider was not able to identify the number of kms made on breakaway by riders, so “Intermediate Sprints Presence” criteria is used to replace Breakaway criteria.
for_each_km_ridden_in_a_breakaway_points: For each km ridden in a breakaway, points are given.
intermediate_sprints_presence_more_a_rid: *Intermediate Sprints Presence : More a rider is classified on Intermediates sprints, more he scores points. It is calculated proportionally to the number of Intermediate sprints presence total of the race. By being classified on all Intermediate sprints presence, a rider can score at maximum 50 points.This criteria is only available at the end of the race, to be sure our data provider gets every Intermediate Sprints.
for_each_stage_points_are_given_if_the_r: For each stage, points are given if the rider finishes the stage.
at_each_stage_points_are_given_to_the_ri: At each stage, points are given to the rider if he is the leader of the general classification ranking.
for_the_last_stage_the_points_are_multip: For the last stage the points are multiplied by 2.
at_the_end_of_the_race_points_are_given_: At the end of the race, points are given according to the rider general classification ranking.
At the end of the race, points are given according to the rider’s team general classification ranking.
the_criteria_intermediate_sprints_presen: The criteria “Intermediate Sprints Presence” will be used only if our data provider is not able to identify the number of kms made on breakaway by riders. If it is still not the case at the end of the race, the points scored by a rider each time he is classified on an Intermediate Sprints (Points or KOM) will be shown here at the end of the race.
riders_dont_score_points_thanks_to: Riders don’t score points thanks to Intermediate Sprints Presence because we are able to identify the number of kms made on breakaway by riders. So riders score points thanks to Breakaway Points.
our_data_provider_was_not_able_to_identi: Our data provider was not able to identify the number of kms made on breakaway, so “Intermediate Sprints Presence” criteria is used to replace Breakaway criteria. Here are the points scored by a rider each time he is classified on an Intermediate Sprints (Points or KOM).
per_intermediate_sprints_crossed_in_the_: Per Intermediate sprints crossed in the classification.
at_each_stage_points_are_given_to_the_ri: At each stage, points are given to the rider if he is the leader of the KOM classification ranking.
at_the_end_of_the_race_points_are_given_: At the end of the race, points are given according to the rider KOM (Mountain) classification ranking.
to_make_this_ranking_even_points_scored_: To make this ranking, even points scored from riders who don’t finish the race are used.
at_the_end_of_the_race_points_are_given_: At the end of the race, points are given according to the rider Points (Sprint) classification ranking.
at_each_stage_points_are_given_to_the_ri: At each stage, points are given to the rider if he is the leader of the Point (Sprint) classification ranking.
for_each_stage_points_are_given_accordin: For each stage, points are given according to the rider stage ranking.
For each stage, points are given according to the rider’s team stage ranking.
if_the_rider_begins_the_race_points_are_: If the rider begins the race, points are given.
the_score_of_the_rider_is_represented_by: The score of the rider is represented by In Race Score.
in_access_mode_if_a_rider_won_stages_dur: In Access mode, if a rider won stages during the race, his score is the best between “In Race Score” and “Minimum winning stage score”.
